column2: Updates to BNT162b2, AZD 1222, mRNA-12731 vaccines. Prices not publicly known - US$7 per dose used for estimates. Vaccine specifications are indicative and SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
column3: CVIC version 1 is being depreciated, please upgrade to version 2 - https://www.who.int/publications/i/item/who-2019-ncov-vaccine_deployment_tool-2021.1
column16: Low Dead Space Syringe (0.3ml) and Needle
